text: What happens when a prince interviews a president? Well, if this teaser of Britain ’ s Prince Harry interviewing former US president Barack Obama is anything to go by, the answer is a lot of fun. On Prince Harry ’ s request, Barack Obama agreed to star in a guest edition of BBC Radio 4 ’ s Today programme. Kensington Palace shared the trailer on Sunday, where Harry can be seen joking with Obama. In the preview, Obama asks Harry if he has to speak quickly, since he is a slow speaker. “ Do I need a British accent? ” jokes Obama.
